# The `function_ref` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An efficient, type-erasing, non-owning reference to a callable. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename Fn&gt;
class llvm::function_ref&lt;Fn&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

An efficient, type-erasing, non-owning reference to a callable.

This is intended for use as the type of a function parameter that is not used after the function in question returns.

This class does not own the callable, so it is not in general safe to store a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>.

Definition at line 37 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlfunctionalextras-h">STLFunctionalExtras.h</a>.
